text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
—Looks like we're up. Let's go, C.B… 
Let's show 'em the way we roll full-on!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Alright, Ace. C'mere. Let's dance like no one's watching— just you and me!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
"A celebratory New Year's calligraphy performance,"…?! 
We're… going to do that?!
That's… it's that thing, right? I saw it on a relay program once! Like, you move about while holding this super big brush and write wishes for the coming year!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: If I remember correctly, the last participants were baseball players, weren't they? One of the players' dog wrote a dot with its paw, too. Sooo cute.
Haha, right! The way they were holding the brush like a bat and writing letters like 'shwaaa' was really funny!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text:
So we've been asked to rep Tracen 
Academy doing that this year, huh…!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Indeed. We'd like you to be the face of the new year, so to speak. After I spoke with the board director, we decided on you two.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I chatted with Rudolf beforehand and got the a-okay! 
C.B., Ace, what do you two think?

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Sounds fun, I'm in! When I was watching the baseball players, they seemed free to express themselves however they wanted, after all.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Plus, with all of you here— seems like I'll be in good company.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Well, I'm glad to hear it. 
What say you, Katsuragi Ace?
Hell yeah, I'm in!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text:
Like C.B. said, seems interesting. 
I gotta give it my all as the Renegade Ace!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text:
Good! In that case, I'll enter the four of us. 
Which leaves just one more…
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Hm? There's still someone else?
Yuppers! Our fifth's going to be Ramonu! …Though I get a feeling it won't be that easy—
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Oh, speak of the devil! C'mon in! 
… What's this?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Um… pardon the intrusion. I'm Mejiro Ardan, 
entering on behalf of my s— Mejiro Ramonu.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Haha… a substitute, I see. 
Would you mind elaborating on the situation, Mejiro Ardan?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Of course… Well, when I showed her the proposal, she said she had no mind to participate… and told me to go in her stead.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: So that's how it is… but you mustn't hang your head. You're actually doing us a great service, Mejiro Ardan.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's nothing!… Inexperienced though I am, I'll do my very best to make this event a success. I'm looking forward to it.

Course! Aight, so it's me and C.B., 
Maruzen, Rudolf, and Ardan—
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: Let's knock this calligraphy performance outta the park!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Stop, and then the next stroke… 
lift the brush, and avoid the edge…
Oh, Ardan! What's that, a calligraphy performance video?
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Yes! I thought I should look at the performers from previous years to get an idea of how they move.
Woah… now that's a good idea! Hey, can I watch with you?
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: Let's get the movements down-pat before practice with everyone so we can surprise the socks off 'em! We got this, Ardan!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Hehe… yes, let's!
Looks like we're set! Ramonu threw a bit of a wrench in things like always, but I think things'll work out… don't you, Rudolf?
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Agreed. We won't let a small change like this stop us. You could call it a change for the better, or perhaps even an improvement.
In any case, let us see this through to the end with our powers combined, Maruzensky.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: Yeah! What is it that you always say… "To bring bliss to all Umamusume!", right?
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
